data.title: Awards and Honors
data.meta_description: The University Archives maintains lists of recipients of selected University awards and honorary degrees. Anyone with information on past winners of University awards not listed here should contact the University Archives. Awards and honors include: George Arents Pioneer Medal, Chancellor's Citation for Excellence, Chancellor's Medal, Melvin A. Eggers Senior Alumni Award, Orange Circle, Letter Winners of Distinction, and Syracuse University Scholars. - Syracuse University Libraries
data.text:
This designation is the highest undergraduate academic honor bestowed at the University. The University Scholars represent the entire SU graduating class at the May Commencement ceremony. Criteria used by the SU Scholars Selection Committee-a University-wide faculty committee-to select scholars includes course work and academic achievement, creative work, a personal statement and a faculty letter of recommendation. Additionally, the committee evaluates how each scholar has taken his or her knowledge and experience out of the classroom and engaged the world.
